metadata.title: CVE-2014-9475 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in thumb.php in MediaWiki before1.19.23, 1.2x before 1.22.15, 1.23.x before 1.23.8, and 1.24.x before1.24.1 allows remote authenticated users to inject arbitrary web script orHTML via a wikitext message.

criterions.comment: mediawiki: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
